column4: I have found this: http://appdb.winehq.org/appview.php?iVersionId=7530 but what do I do now?  Can someone please help me?  I have no clue what I am doing.  First day ever on Linux.
All I want to do is play Guild Wars
People in #wine may be able to help you.
Not only that, you are trying to run a game that doesn't run nativly in the OS.  You have to expect some setup time.
